Class Patient

java.lang.Object
Shared.Users
Patient.Patient
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Patient extends Users
The Patient class represents a patient with their personal details.
Author:
Grover EKhnoor Kaur, Cheng Jun Long Brandon
